data.title: The Shiers, An Irish Palatine Family
data.text:
Death*She died on 17 August 2022 at age 78; It is with heaviest of hearts that we share the sudden passing of our beloved Sunny at the age of 78.is predeceased by her loving mother Ann; father Mike; Baba, Geegee, aunty Jean, aunty Nellie and Poucette.will be sadly missed and lovingly remembered by her husband of 49 years Richard; daughters, Cari, Lisa and Tiffany; grandchildren, Lauren (Steve), Cory and Egan; great-grandchild Charleigh; grand dogs Buster, Tipper Joy, Daisy and Zenon as well as many cousins, nieces, nephews and friends.was born and raised in Winnipeg, Manitoba in the north end. She was a single mother raising two children working at Consolidated Mercury, Winnipeg Free Press and North Star Inn where she met her loving husband.enjoyed going to Grand Forks every chance she got. She belonged to the Red Hat Society and loved Snowbirding with her husband in their motorhome.was a Mom who was truly one of a kind, with a sense of humour that was unmatched. She struck up a conversation with everyone she met and all who met her loved her personality and the feeling she left behind with them.loved her so very much and just canâ€™t imagine our lives without her in it. Our hearts are broken and will never be the same.

Until we are together again....you to everyone who had her and us in their prayers.funeral service will be held at Chapel Lawn Funeral Home 4000 Portage Avenue, September 8, 2022 at 2:00 p.m.lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Canadian Cancer Society.
